Most Illustrious Sir

Acknowledging the receipt of the letters that Your Excellency sent on the 14th and 15th of the current month, I must in response inform you, regarding the first, that I am certain Your Excellency has informed Faria Faria, to whom the carrying out of the orders transmitted therein was entrusted, and regarding the second, with the orders to Rafael Teixeira Marins and Captain Joaquim Gomes de Araújo, your request concerning the goods purchased from the latter is satisfied.

God keep Your Excellency  
Secretary of the Treasury Affairs in Piratini, January 19, 1839  
Domingos José de Almeida

Most Illustrious Sir João Antônio da Silveira,  
Worthy Commander of the Right Division.
